name: Poblano Cream Sauce Pasta
description: This vegan espagueti verde recipe is creamy, spicy and rich. The roasted poblano cream sauce is perfect for tossing pasta in.
recipeIngredient: ¼ cup Unsweetened almond milk or vegetable oil ((see note))

recipeInstructions.text: Boil salted water in a large pot.
recipeInstructions.name: Boil salted water in a large pot.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook spaghetti according to the directions on the box.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook spaghetti according to the directions on the box.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place the almonds, almond milk, garlic, lemon juice, cilantro,water, and poblano peppers in the blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, place the almonds, almond milk, garlic, lemon juice, cilantro,water, and poblano peppers in the blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Process until smooth, season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Process until smooth, season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain spaghetti and place in a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain spaghetti and place in a large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add desired amount of sauce and toss.
recipeInstructions.name: Add desired amount of sauce and toss.

keywords: poblano cream sauce, vegan mexican, vegan pasta
